Chinese: [DDPM Win 2.1.1]: 在PBP mode下插拔 Input Port後無自動連線
Title: [DDPM Win 2.1.1]: After unplugging/plugging cable in PBP mode, NKVM does not automatically connect.
System information:
DDPM version: 2.1.1.8
PC1 model :  Dell Inspiron 7510
OS version : Windows 11 Education 24H2 (26100.4202)
Graphics Chipset  : Intel(R) UHD Graphics
PC2 model : ASUS-FX516PM
OS version : Windows 10 Home 22H2 (19045.6036)
Graphics Chipset  : Intel(R) Iris(R) Xe Graphics


Monitor / FW : P3426WEB/32T106
Input Source : C to DP  (Connect to Inspiron 7510)
Input Source : HDMI  (Connect to ASUS-FX516PM)
Description:
Testcase: Network KVM Connectivity #9
1. P3426WEB connects 
to PC1 & PC2
2. Launch DDPM > KVM > Open Network > Add PC2 > set 2PBP Mode
3. Unplug video cable from PC1 and plug in cable again.
Result: NKVM does not automatically connect
Expectation: NKVM should automatically resume connection
Link:
"\SDQA-SEVER\Windows\Video\DDPM Windows 2.1.1\After unplugging plugging cable in PBP mode , NKVM does not automatically connect..mp4"

"\SDQA-SEVER\Windows\Log\DDPM Win 2.1.1\After unplugging plugging cable in PBP mode , NKVM does not automatically connect_DESKTOP-24V95NG.zip"
"\SDQA-SEVER\Windows\Log\DDPM Win 2.1.1\After unplugging plugging cable in PBP mode , NKVM does not automatically connect_781DMF.zip"

Chinese: [DDPM Win 2.1.1]: CLI下disable後 NetworkKVM的 label顏色太淡
Title: [DDPM Win 2.1.1]: Network KVM text color too light When disabled
System information:
DDPM version: 2.1.1.9
PC1 model :  Elite Dragonfly G2
OS version : Windows 10 Pro 22H2, 19045.5965
Graphics Chipset  : Intel(R) Xe Graphics
PC2 model : Predator 
PH315-54-72VQ
OS version : Windows 11 Home 24H2, 26100.4484 
Graphics Chipset : NIVIDIA GeForce RTX 3070 Latop GPU 

Monitor1 / FW : P2426HEB/32T108
Input Source : USB-C  (Connet to Dragonfly G2)
Monitor2 / FW : U2424H/M3B102)
Input Source : USB-C  (Connet to Predator PH315-54-72VQ)
Description:
1.
Launch software > KVM
2. Open command prompt and type "/set -Display=NetworkKVM -value=disable"
3. Observe the option text for "Network KVM"

Result: The text color is too light, making it hardly visible.
Expectation: The text color is clearly visible.
Link: "\sdqa-sever\Windows\會議討論\DDPM Windows 2.0\2.1.1.7\label text under disable.png"

Chinese: [DDPM Win 2.1.2]: 在3/4PBP下 Swap 2 PIP/PBP windows 可做動
Title: [DDPM Win 2.1.2]: Under 3PBP/4PBP, swapping 2 PIP/PBP windows is available.
System information:
DDPM version: 2.1.2.3
PC1 model : ASUS-FX516PM
OS version : Windows 10 Home 22H2 (19045.6093)
Graphics Chipset  : Intel(R) Iris(R) Xe Graphics
PC2 model : Dell Latitude 9520
OS version : Windows 11 Pro 24H2 (26100.4770)
Graphics Chipset  : Intel(R) Iris(R) Xe Graphics
PC1 model :  Dell Inspiron 7510
OS version : Windows 11 Education 24H2 (26100.4202)
Graphics Chipset  : Intel(R) UHD Graphics


Monitor / FW : U5226KW/22T110
Input Source 
: C to DP  (Connect to ASUS-FX516PM)
Input Source : TBT  (Connect to Latitude 9520)
Input Source : HDMI  (Connect to Inspiron 7510)
Description:
Testcase: Network KVM Connectivity #12
1. DUT connects to PC1 & PC2 & PC3
2. Launch DDPM > KVM > Open NetworkKVM>Add PC2 & PC3 > set 3PBP Mode
3. Input Source > Hotkeys > Swap 2 PIP/PBP windows.
Result: Under 3PBP, swapping 2 PIP/PBP windows is available.
Expectation: This hotkey is disabled in PBP 3 or 4 windows.
Nothing happen when using this hotkey if assigned during PBP 2 windows.
Link:
"\SDQA-SEVER\Windows\Log\DDPM Win 2.1.2\Under 3PBP, swapping 2 PIPPBP windows is possible._781DMF.zip"

"\SDQA-SEVER\Windows\Video\DDPM Win 2.1.2\Under 3PBP, swapping 2 PIP PBP windows is possible.mp4"

Chinese: [DDPM Win 2.1.2]: hybrid pbp on 連線的情況下螢幕圖示顯示4格
Title: [DDPM Win 2.1.2]: In Hybrid PBP, the monitor icon shows a 2x2 grid icon.
System information:
DDPM version: 2.1.2.3
PC1 model : ASUS-FX516PM
OS version : Windows 10 Home 22H2 (19045.6093)
Graphics Chipset  : Intel(R) Iris(R) Xe Graphics
PC2 model : Dell Inspiron 7441
OS version : Windows 11 Pro 24H2 (26100.4770)
Graphics Chipset : Qualcomm(R) Adreno(TM) x1-85 GPU
BIOS version/Date :  Dell Inc. 2.11.0 , 6/9/2025

Monitor 
/ FW : U5226KW/22T110
Input Source : C to DP  (Connect to ASUS-FX516PM)
Input Source : TBT  (Connect to Inspiron 7441)
Description:
Testcase : Network KVM Connectivity #15
1. DUT connects to PC1 & PC2 
2. In OSD, Go to PBP > PIP/PBP  > Hybrid Screen Partition (DP/TBT) = ON.
3. Open Software > KVM > proceed until completion.

Result: In Hybrid PBP, the monitor icon shows a 2x2 grid icon.
Expectation: In Hybrid PBP,  the monitor icon shows a horizontal split-screen icon.
Link:
"\SDQA-SEVER\Windows\Log\DDPM Win 2.1.2\In Hybrid PBP, the monitor icon shows a 2x2 grid icon._DESKTOP-EESRN88.zip"

Chinese: [DDPM Win 2.1.2]: 在hybrid pbp 且 OS display 為 duplicate  下 ,滑鼠cross的位置非預期
Title: [DDPM Win 2.1.2]: In hybrid pbp with OS display set to duplicate, the mouse cross position is unexpected.
System information:
DDPM version: 2.1.2.4
PC1 model :  Dell Inspiron 7510
OS version : Windows 11 Education 24H2 (26100.4202)
Graphics 
Chipset  : Intel(R) UHD Graphics
PC2 model : Dell Latitude 9520
OS version : Windows 11 Pro 24H2 (26100.4770)
Graphics Chipset  : Intel(R) Iris(R) Xe Graphics


Monitor / FW : U5226KW/32T103
Input Source : C to DP  (Connect to Inspiron 7510)
Input Source : C to DP (Connect to Latitude 9520)
Description:
1.
DUT connects to PC1 & PC2 
2. Open Software > KVM > NKVM > Add PC2 > set hybrid PBP mode
3. PC1 OS display set  duplicate , PC2 OS display set extend
4. Move the mouse cursor across  hybrid PBP screen.
Result: 1. Move the mouse downward from PC1's screen. The mouse will move to the left side of PC2's second screen.
2. Move the mouse upward from PC2's screen. The mouse will jump directly to the top-left corner of PC1's screen (the movement path will not be visible)
Expectation:  In hybrid pbp with OS display set to duplicate, the mouse cross position is unexpected.
Link:
"\SDQA-SEVER\Windows\Video\DDPM Win 2.1.2\In hybrid PBP mode and with duplicate OS display, the mouse crosshair is incorrectly positioned.mp4"

"\SDQA-SEVER\Windows\Log\DDPM Win 2.1.2\In hybrid pbp with OS display set to duplicate, the mouse cross position is unexpected_DESKTOP-509BG1L.zip"
"\SDQA-SEVER\Windows\Log\DDPM Win 2.1.2\In hybrid pbp with OS display set to duplicate, the mouse cross position is unexpected_781DMF.zip"

Title: [DDPM Win 2.1.2]: When unplug the input source, the mouse cannot cross specific PBP layout.
System information:
DDPM version: 2.1.2.5
PC1 
model :  Dell Alienware M15 R6, Windows 10 Pro 22H2(19056 5608)
Graphics Chipset  : Intel(R) UHD Graphics
PC2 model : Dell Latitude 5415, Windows 11 Education 24H2, 26100.4946 
Graphics Chipset  : AMD Ryzen 5 5500U with Radeon Graphics
PC3 model : Dell Latitude 9520, Windows 11 Pro 24H2, 26100.4946
Graphics Chipset  : Intel(R) Iris(R) Xe Graphics

Monitor / FW : U5226KW/32T103

Input Source : HDMI  (Connect to Alienware M15 R6 )
Input Source : C to DP (Connect to Latitude 5415 ) 
Input Source : HDMI (Connect to Latitude 9520)
Description:
1.
Open Software > KVM >  NKVM > Add PC2 & PC3 > 3 PBP windows (25% 50% 25%)> proceed until completion.
2. Unplugging the 50% layout input.
3. Move the mouse cursor across 3 PBP screen.
Result: When unplug the input source, the mouse cannot cross specific PBP layout.
Expectation: Mouse cursor able to move diagonally, vertically and horizontally across 3 PBP screen.
Link:
"\sdqa-sever\Windows\Video\DDPM Win 2.1.2\In a specific PBP layout, when the input source is disconnected, the mouse cannot cross over..mp4"

Chinese: [DDPM Win 2.1.2]: 做 hibernate 後NKVM無自動連線
Title: [DDPM Win 2.1.2]: After hibernating, NKVM does not automatically connect.
System information:

PC1 model : ASUS-FX516PM
OS version : Windows 10 Home 22H2 (19045.6216)
Graphics Chipset  : Intel(R) Iris(R) Xe Graphics

Monitor / FW 
: U5226KW/32T103
Input Source : C to DP  (Connect to Inspiron 7510)
Input Source : C to DP (Connect to ASUS-FX516PM)
Description:
Testcase: Network KVM Connectivity #20
1. DUT1 connects to PC1 & PC2
2. Open Software > KVM > NKVM > Add PC2
3. PC2 is in hibernate mode.
4. Wait for 5 minutes. In PC2, wake up PC2 from hibernate.

Result: After hibernating, NKVM does not automatically connect.
Expectation: PC2 should be able to wake up from sleep or hibernate, then resume connection.
